name: Rei Taro
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior DevOps Engineer with over 10 years of experience in designing scalable and high-performing systems. Proficient in **AWS**, **Docker**, **Kubernetes**, **Terraform**, and **CI/CD** methodologies, with a strong background in **Linux** environments. Experienced in performance profiling and implementing design patterns that enhance software architecture and data structures. Skilled in utilizing AI tools and developing pipelines for LLMs, CV, and VLMs. A collaborative communicator with a proven record at leading organizations such as VISA, Sii Poland, and Reply Polska, focused on driving impactful DevOps initiatives aligned with business goals.
